phrases: To awaken us, the young mankind
And fight to protect their loved ones
Will set out on their journey
Slicing through the darkness they fly toward
That blue planet that shines in the distance
With the Macross having lost its Fold System,
those aboard have been forced to proceed using conventional engines.
However, the enemy Zentradi fleet has been tracking the Macross
Though having to fend off repeated attacks,
the Macross has finally passed within the orbit of Mars.
They certainly do not give up, do they?
Their resolve is strengthening now that they are so close to their homeworld.
Perhaps we have allowed them to get just a little too close...
I wonder how they will act when they realize they are so near,
yet they will never be allowed to return home...
I am sure they will be quite frustrated.
There is just one thing that worries me.
So, what sort of present would make a girl happy?
Will the following personnel please report to the UN Forces Command Center?
Commander, should we really be launching an attack without orders?
This is a training flight, nothing more.
We will just happen to accidentally encounter the enemy.
Old Man Britai will be pretty steamed, though.
This time, we fight by the rules of the Kamujin Clan!
Your group will be the decoys.
Let us give them a real show!
It looks like everyone is here.
All of you assembled here today distinguished yourselves
we hereby award you the UN Forces Titanium Medal.
Please step forward as I call your names.
Come to my room for a second.
What did you want to talk to me about, Sempai?
This is your new rank insignia.
As of today, you are a 2nd Lieutenant.
Put that on instead of the medal.
You should not be walking around showing that thing off.
You get a couple of subordinates.
They are a couple of total rookies!
The way I see it, you are not that far ahead of them.
You can find more detailed information on them in the computer,
Things a team leader needs to know.
This is 2nd Lieutenant Hikaru Ichijo, your team leader.
He is a hero who just received the Titanium Medal.
Ichijo, take good care of them.
Uh... I mean, I am Corporal Hayao Kakizaki.
Now that I am here, you can just leave everything to me!
And I am Corporal Maximilian Jenius, sir.
I am rather inexperienced, so I would appreciate any guidance you could give me.
I look forward to working with you.
Sempai, there is somewhere I have to be, so...
It would be nice to show Minmay that I have moved up a notch or two.
Well then, let us be off!
By the way, where are we going?
Hey, just leave that to me.
I am taking you somewhere really great.
I am looking forward to it.
To take us to a real party, huh?
Jeez, they are already running off like a gaggle of schoolgirls!
How could Hikaru Ichijo have been promoted to team leader?!
It is probably a reward for rescuing you on Mars.
A rookie like that becoming team leader...
This is not the military I joined.
That is the great place, right?
The one you were talking about.
I tell ya, I just love places like these!
I think you have gotten the wrong idea about this.
You seem to know a lot about those sorts of places.
Women go wild over us soldiers!
Now hold on, you are not a soldier until you actually fly a mission.
I would like to get into battle as soon I can!
I would not want to end up like that.
With me around, we will do just fine!
It is nothing to get depressed about.
Hey, I like the sound of that.
And this right here is Corporal Jenius.
I am honored to be in the presence of someone so lovely.
You are such a flatterer, Maximilian... um...
Of course I did not forget!
Yeah, I came here straight from work, and left it in my room.
Minmay, do not be so hard on Li'l Hikaru.
Mr. Mayor, could you please stop calling me Li'l Hikaru?
I am a team leader now, you know.
Anyway, Minmay, how about a song or something?
I hear ya can even put pros to shame!
That can be your present to me.
Well then, why do not I sing in his place?
Li'l Hikaru, if you do not watch out, you are going to lose her.
There is something about the radar response.
It is as if the waves are just being dispersed.
That is the bad thing about soldiers...
Hey, give us a ride too!
This is not going to work!
Say, Leader, that Minmay girl was really hot!
You know, we have just met!
Max, with me in this battle, it will be like having a thousand extra guys!
Man, I wish I were that confiden...
Black Squadron, intercept the enemy at Block 4!
So, which section are we defending?
The final line of defense for Block 2.
That is all the way in the back!
Jeez, they are already seein' action over there!
Normally, I would be out there where the fighting is, too...
Captain, there is just too many of them.
Deploy the Defenders onto the hull.
Defender Team 2 has been wiped out!
An enemy formation has broken through!
VA-102, you have enemies incoming at 3 of the clock high!
Kakizaki, do not charge at them!
That is why you should not go rushing in by yourself!
It is easier to get'them where you want them this way.
Like shooting fish in a barrel...
You are looking slow out there.
You are a team leader now, so get on the ball!
It is hard to lead a team!
They appear to have been weakened in the area below the Ramidon section.
This will embarrass the old man.
Kakizaki, do not waste your ammo!
But it is all right if we DO NOT waste it, right?
All right, pursue and maintain fire!
If we have made it this far then victory is ours.
It is hard being an officer on the Macross.
The first one who moves, dies.
I thought it was strange he was so willing to lead a training flight.
His campaign seems to be going unusually well.
He has to follow the same rules as the rest of the Zentradi military.
Prepare to send a wide-area beam signal.
I do not want him claiming that his comm system was damaged.
Wide-area beam signal is ready, sir!
If they refuse, tell them they will be sent back where they came from!
I thought we were done for.
It looks like perhaps they have some internal troubles of their own.
In any case, we are saved.
The body of my fighter was completely wrecked!
What will I do if it comes out of my salary?
You sure did well out there, Max.
Yeah, no ordinary person could have done the things you did.
Anyway, how did you fare, Leader?
That must have been my fault.
Normally, you would get more than Max, right?
So I am a genius, huh?
Why did they choose me to be team leader?
I was a lot happier taking orders instead of giving them.
After all, you are a soldier.
You brought it with you, did not you?
For Hikaru, seeing Minmay's happy face
and knowing that he was the one who brought her joy
means more to him than the medal he never expected to receive.
Now, the voyage of the Macross enters its eighth month.
To celebrate the launch of a ship-wide television network,
it is decided to hold a Miss Macross contest.
Minmay is also one of the contestants.
Suddenly, however, a Zentradi recon unit appears,
and Hikaru flies out to intercept it,
wondering all the while about the outcome of the contest.
I will not follow it anymore,
The shadow you cast as you run away
We all keep running until the end
But we still cannot see the goal
Even now, I keep running toward
The light that shines so far away
